article_title: Gaza health ministry says Israeli hostage rescue killed 274 Palestinians
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  an  Israeli  raid  on  a  refugee  camp  -  which  led  to  the  rescue  of  four  hostages  -  killed  274  people,  including  children  and  other  civilians.
